College of Lore is a Subclass of the Bard class in Baldur's Gate 3. Bards primary ability is Charisma, their saving throw proficiencies are Dexterity & Charisma, and they have a Hit Dice of 1d8. They have proficiency with Simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords and with Light armor.

You pursue beauty and truth, collecting knowledge from scholarly tomes to peasants' tales, and use your gifts to hold both audiences and enemies spellbound.

COLLEGE OF LORE TIPS & BUILDS

College of Lore is a Bard subclass ideal for more spellcasting versatility, that can be used as a powerful support role. Try to stay away from the front lines, and provide support by debuffing enemies or buffing your party members. College of Lore Bards learn Cutting Words which receive a 1d6 penalty to Attack Rolls, Ability Checks, and damage dealt until the start of your next turn. At level 5 and at level 10 the penalty is increased, to 1d8 and 1d10, respectively. Cutting Words is a great ability to debuff enemies. At level 6, College of Lore Bards choose 2 Spells from Magical Secrets spell list of Level 3 or lower. NEW! - New Spells have been added to the Bard's Magical Secrets Spells List in Patch #1, released on August 25, 2023. NEW! - At level 3 the Bard can now freely choose three additional skill proficiencies they wish to take as of Patch #1, released on August 25, 2023, replacing the previous system where the bard always got proficiency in Arcana, Intimidation and Sleight of Hand.
